  • All text below - white text

We have a winner, the video is now running on mobile. Please take a look and let us know what you think?

The weekend was sensational, hope yours was too!

If you would like us to try and get it running as bg video on mobile for DBD, then we will ideally need the Vimeo logins to make it work. 

Let me know?

Hi Heath,



Hope you had a great long weekend.



The below makes perfect sense to me, and my recommendation has been to get rid of the video banners entirely as they look awful.

Stuart














stuart@cbo.meHead of Performance





P: 1300 660 285 · M: 0434 043 385





Level 13, 333 George St, Sydney NSW

Hi Stuart, 

We have tried to achieve this for a good part of the day and the general consensus is to render an image instead of a background video. Natively mobile browsers don't support bg videos so that is a heap of work arounds that need to take place for it to work, especially on the current theme.

There is also a strong case for not auto loading them as mobiles running on 3G/4G connections have no way to stop/pause the bg videos, so it's not the best user experience. 

Let me know if you are ok if we use the static image as originally planned? We have updated the static image to be one of the new girl from the new video.

Hi Stuart, 

Just letting you know we are trying to get a solution working for this. I'll have an update for you shortly.
@joel Please tell Stuart you have done it on DB Dental and ask him if he would like it applied to the NDC as well? Cheers!!

@heath https://www.dbdental.com.au/

do I need to apply this also on national dental care?
@joel

Morning Heath, Sorry for the delay, as I was in Brisbane all day yesterday. We got the video .MOV file below for you.
  • With no text https://www.dropbox.com/s/svb9c51n5qj0dl9/shutterstock_v19619014%20%281%29.mov?dl=0
Let me know if you need anything further. Regards, Stuart stuart@cbo.meHead of Performance P: 1300 660 285 · M: 0434 043 385 Level 13, 333 George St, Sydney NSW

Hi Stuart,
 
We have looked into this, it's because we had to by pass the revolution slider and embed the video in an iframe from Vimeo (this is a limitation of a mobile browser).

That being said, If you can get us a copy (mp4 or similar) of the video, we should be able to code a solution around this. Background video on mobiles can be tricky at the best of times.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig
